attributes.action: Make taxation more transparent review council tax to a fair system
attributes.background: Council tax is now outdated and  currently unfair and needs replacing with a fair system so that everyone pays a portion for all  services provided.The current system is causing misery and debt to many .

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for a specific change to the council tax system or a petition calling for the Government to review the council tax system and develop proposals for changes to make it fairer.
